MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shut down at 11.15pm to remove generators and complete the permanent cable repair. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:53pm on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
